a.n: Desire Threesomes: Falling From Grace Scene 4

p.k: Marcia and Warren Grace (Bridgette B and Xander Corvus) are spiritual leaders, delivering their sermons on television for the world to see. They are upstanding citizens and pillars of the community, as adored as they are worshipped, but behind closed doors they are perverse sexual deviants who enjoy a life of excess.
